1: וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> שִׁמְשׁ֖וֹן <sup>8123 </sup> <n>Samson</n> עַזָּ֑תָה <sup>5804 </sup> <n>to Gaza</n> וַיַּרְא־ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>and saw</n> שָׁם֙ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> אִשָּׁ֣ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>ess</n> זוֹנָ֔ה <sup>2181 </sup> <n>commit fornication</n> וַיָּבֹ֖א <sup>935 </sup> <n>and went in</n> אֵלֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n>
2: לַֽעַזָּתִ֣ים ׀ <sup>5841 </sup> <n>[And it was told] the Gazites</n> לֵאמֹ֗ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> בָּ֤א <sup>935 </sup> <n>is come</n> שִׁמְשׁוֹן֙ <sup>8123 </sup> <n>Samson</n> הֵ֔נָּה <sup>2008 </sup> <n>here</n> וַיָּסֹ֛בּוּ <sup>5437 </sup> <n>hither And they compassed [him] in</n> וַיֶּאֶרְבוּ־ <sup>693 </sup> <n>and laid wait</n> ל֥וֹ כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַלַּ֖יְלָה <sup>3915 </sup> <n>for him all night</n> בְּשַׁ֣עַר <sup>8179 </sup> <n>in the gate</n> הָעִ֑יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the city</n> וַיִּתְחָרְשׁ֤וּ <sup>2790 </sup> <n>and were quiet</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַלַּ֙יְלָה֙ <sup>3915 </sup> <n>all the night</n> לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> א֥וֹר <sup>216 </sup> <n>when it is day</n> הַבֹּ֖קֶר <sup>1242 </sup> <n>In the morning</n> וַהֲרְגְנֻֽהוּ׃ <sup>2026 </sup> <n>we shall kill</n>
3: וַיִּשְׁכַּ֣ב <sup>7901 </sup> <n>lay</n> שִׁמְשׁוֹן֮ <sup>8123 </sup> <n>And Samson</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> חֲצִ֣י <sup>2677 </sup> <n>half</n> הַלַּיְלָה֒ <sup>3915 </sup> <n>night</n> וַיָּ֣קָם ׀ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>and arose</n> בַּחֲצִ֣י <sup>2677 </sup> <n>half</n> הַלַּ֗יְלָה <sup>3915 </sup> <n>night</n> וַיֶּאֱחֹ֞ז <sup>270 </sup> <n>and took</n> בְּדַלְת֤וֹת <sup>1817 </sup> <n>the doors</n> שַֽׁעַר־ <sup>8179 </sup> <n>of the gate</n> הָעִיר֙ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of the city</n> וּבִשְׁתֵּ֣י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>and the two</n> הַמְּזוּז֔וֹת <sup>4201 </sup> <n>posts</n> וַיִּסָּעֵם֙ <sup>5265 </sup> <n>and went away</n> עִֽם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>along</n> הַבְּרִ֔יחַ <sup>1280 </sup> <n>with them bar</n> וַיָּ֖שֶׂם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and all and put</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> כְּתֵפָ֑יו <sup>3802 </sup> <n>[them] upon his shoulders</n> וַֽיַּעֲלֵם֙ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>and carried them up</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>up</n> רֹ֣אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>to the top</n> הָהָ֔ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>of an hill</n> אֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>that</n> פְּנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>that [is] before</n> חֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <sup>2275 </sup> <n>Hebron</n> פ
4: וַֽיְהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> אַחֲרֵי־ <sup>310 </sup> <n>And it came to pass afterward</n> כֵ֔ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>this</n> וַיֶּאֱהַ֥ב <sup>157 </sup> <n>that he loved</n> אִשָּׁ֖ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>a woman</n> בְּנַ֣חַל <sup>5158 </sup> <n>in the valley</n> שֹׂרֵ֑ק <sup>7796 </sup> <n>of Sorek</n> וּשְׁמָ֖הּ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>whose name</n> דְּלִילָֽה׃ <sup>1807 </sup> <n>[was] Delilah</n>
5: וַיַּעֲל֨וּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>came up</n> אֵלֶ֜יהָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> סַרְנֵ֣י <sup>5633 </sup> <n>And the lords</n> פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>of the Philistines</n> וַיֹּ֨אמְרוּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto her and said</n> לָ֜הּ פַּתִּ֣י <sup>6601 </sup> <n>unto her Entice</n> אוֹת֗וֹ <sup>853 </sup> וּרְאִי֙ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>him and see</n> בַּמֶּה֙ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>where</n> כֹּח֣וֹ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>strength</n> גָד֔וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>wherein his great</n> וּבַמֶּה֙ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>and how</n> נ֣וּכַל <sup>3201 </sup> <n>[lieth] and by what [means] we may prevail</n> ל֔וֹ וַאֲסַרְנֻ֖הוּ <sup>631 </sup> <n>against him that we may bind</n> לְעַנֹּת֑וֹ <sup>6031 </sup> <n>him to afflict</n> וַאֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <sup>587 </sup> <n>we</n> נִתַּן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>him and we will give</n> לָ֔ךְ אִ֕ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>thee every one</n> אֶ֥לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> וּמֵאָ֖ה <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n> כָּֽסֶף׃ <sup>3701 </sup> <n>[pieces] of silver</n>

7: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> שִׁמְשׁ֔וֹן <sup>8123 </sup> <n>And Samson</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>to her If</n> יַאַסְרֻ֗נִי <sup>631 </sup> <n>unto her If they bind</n> בְּשִׁבְעָ֛ה <sup>7651 </sup> <n>me with seven</n> יְתָרִ֥ים <sup>3499 </sup> <n>withs</n> לַחִ֖ים <sup>3892 </sup> <n>green</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> חֹרָ֑בוּ <sup>2717 </sup> <n>that were never dried</n> וְחָלִ֥יתִי <sup>2470 </sup> <n>then shall I be weak</n> וְהָיִ֖יתִי <sup>1961 </sup> <n>and be like</n> כְּאַחַ֥ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>and be as another</n> הָאָדָֽם׃ <sup>120 </sup> <n>man</n>
8: וַיַּעֲלוּ־ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>brought up</n> לָ֞הּ סַרְנֵ֣י <sup>5633 </sup> <n>Then the lords</n> פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>of the Philistines</n> שִׁבְעָ֛ה <sup>7651 </sup> <n>to her seven</n> יְתָרִ֥ים <sup>3499 </sup> <n>withs</n> לַחִ֖ים <sup>3892 </sup> <n>green</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>had not</n> חֹרָ֑בוּ <sup>2717 </sup> <n>which had not been dried</n> וַתַּאַסְרֵ֖הוּ <sup>631 </sup> <n>and she bound</n> בָּהֶֽם׃

15: וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And she said</n> אֵלָ֗יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> אֵ֚יךְ <sup>349 </sup> <n>unto him How</n> תֹּאמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>canst thou say</n> אֲהַבְתִּ֔יךְ <sup>157 </sup> <n>I love</n> וְלִבְּךָ֖ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>thee when thine heart</n> אֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>else</n> אִתִּ֑י <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> זֶ֣ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>these</n> שָׁלֹ֤שׁ <sup>7969 </sup> <n>me these three</n> פְּעָמִים֙ <sup>6471 </sup> <n>times</n> הֵתַ֣לְתָּ <sup>2048 </sup> <n>[is] not with me? thou hast mocked</n> בִּ֔י וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> הִגַּ֣דְתָּ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>and hast not told</n> לִּ֔י בַּמֶּ֖ה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>where</n> כֹּחֲךָ֥ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>strength</n> גָדֽוֹל׃ <sup>1419 </sup> <n>me wherein thy great</n>
16: וַ֠יְהִי <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> הֵצִ֨יקָה <sup>6693 </sup> <n>And it came to pass when she pressed</n> לּ֧וֹ בִדְבָרֶ֛יהָ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>with her words</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>him</n> הַיָּמִ֖ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>him daily</n> וַתְּאַֽלֲצֵ֑הוּ <sup>509 </sup> <n>and urged</n> וַתִּקְצַ֥ר <sup>7114 </sup> <n>was vexed</n> נַפְשׁ֖וֹ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>him [so] that his soul</n> לָמֽוּת׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>unto death</n>
17: וַיַּגֶּד־ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>That he told</n> לָ֣הּ אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>her all</n> לִבּ֗וֹ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>her all his heart</n> וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> לָהּ֙ מוֹרָה֙ <sup>4177 </sup> <n>a razor</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>has never</n> עָלָ֣ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>unto her There hath not come</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> רֹאשִׁ֔י <sup>7218 </sup> <n>upon mine head</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> נְזִ֧יר <sup>5139 </sup> <n>for I [have been] a Nazarite</n> אֱלֹהִ֛ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>unto God</n> אֲנִ֖י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> מִבֶּ֣טֶן <sup>990 </sup> <n>womb</n> אִמִּ֑י <sup>517 </sup> <n>from my mother's</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> גֻּלַּ֙חְתִּי֙ <sup>1548 </sup> <n>if I be shaven</n> וְסָ֣ר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>will go</n> מִמֶּ֣נִּי <sup>4480 </sup> <n>then</n> כֹחִ֔י <sup>3581 </sup> <n>then my strength</n> וְחָלִ֥יתִי <sup>2470 </sup> <n>from me and I shall become weak</n> וְהָיִ֖יתִי <sup>1961 </sup> <n>and be like</n> כְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>any</n> הָאָדָֽם׃ <sup>120 </sup> <n>and be like any [other] man</n>
18: וַתֵּ֣רֶא <sup>7200 </sup> <n>saw</n> דְלִילָ֗ה <sup>1807 </sup> <n>And when Delilah</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הִגִּ֣יד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>that he had told</n> לָהּ֮ אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>her all</n> לִבּוֹ֒ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>her all his heart</n> וַתִּשְׁלַ֡ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>she sent</n> וַתִּקְרָא֩ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and called</n> לְסַרְנֵ֨י <sup>5633 </sup> <n>for the lords</n> פְלִשְׁתִּ֤ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>of the Philistines</n> לֵאמֹר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> עֲל֣וּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>Come up</n> הַפַּ֔עַם <sup>6471 </sup> <n>this once</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הִגִּ֥יד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>for he hath shewed</n> [לָהּ כ] (לִ֖י ק) אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> לִבּ֑וֹ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>me all his heart</n> וְעָל֤וּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>came up</n> אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>then</n> סַרְנֵ֣י <sup>5633 </sup> <n>Then the lords</n> פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>of the Philistines</n> וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>unto her and brought</n> הַכֶּ֖סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>money</n> בְּיָדָֽם׃ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>in their hand</n>
19: וַתְּיַשְּׁנֵ֙הוּ֙ <sup>3462 </sup> <n>And she made him sleep</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> בִּרְכֶּ֔יהָ <sup>1290 </sup> <n>upon her knees</n> וַתִּקְרָ֣א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and she called</n> לָאִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>for a man</n> וַתְּגַלַּ֕ח <sup>1548 </sup> <n>and she caused him to shave off</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שֶׁ֖בַע <sup>7651 </sup> <n>the seven</n> מַחְלְפ֣וֹת <sup>4253 </sup> <n>locks</n> רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>of his head</n> וַתָּ֙חֶל֙ <sup>2490 </sup> <n>and she began</n> לְעַנּוֹת֔וֹ <sup>6031 </sup> <n>to afflict</n> וַיָּ֥סַר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>went</n> כֹּח֖וֹ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>him and his strength</n> מֵעָלָֽיו׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n>
20: וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And she said</n> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֥ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>The Philistines</n> עָלֶ֖יךָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> שִׁמְשׁ֑וֹן <sup>8123 </sup> <n>[be] upon thee Samson</n> וַיִּקַ֣ץ <sup>3364 </sup> <n>And he awoke</n> מִשְּׁנָת֗וֹ <sup>8142 </sup> <n>out of his sleep</n> וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> אֵצֵ֞א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>I will go out</n> כְּפַ֤עַם <sup>6471 </sup> <n>as at other times before</n> בְּפַ֙עַם֙ <sup>6471 </sup> <n>times</n> וְאִנָּעֵ֔ר <sup>5287 </sup> <n>and shake</n> וְהוּא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> יָדַ֔ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>myself And he wist</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>not that the LORD</n> סָ֥ר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>was departed</n> מֵעָלָֽיו׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n>
21: וַיֹּאחֲז֣וּהוּ <sup>270 </sup> <n>took</n> פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>But the Philistines</n> וַֽיְנַקְּר֖וּ <sup>5365 </sup> <n>him and put out</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֵינָ֑יו <sup>5869 </sup> <n>his eyes</n> וַיּוֹרִ֨ידוּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>and brought him down</n> אוֹת֜וֹ <sup>853 </sup> עַזָּ֗תָה <sup>5804 </sup> <n>to Gaza</n> וַיַּאַסְר֙וּהוּ֙ <sup>631 </sup> <n>and bound</n> בַּֽנְחֻשְׁתַּ֔יִם <sup>5178 </sup> <n>him with fetters of brass</n> וַיְהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> טוֹחֵ֖ן <sup>2912 </sup> <n>and he did grind</n> בְּבֵ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> [הָאֲסִירִים כ] (הָאֲסוּרִֽים׃ <sup>615 </sup> <n>bound</n> ק)
22: וַיָּ֧חֶל <sup>2490 </sup> <n>began</n> שְׂעַר־ <sup>8181 </sup> <n>Howbeit the hair</n> רֹאשׁ֛וֹ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>of his head</n> לְצַמֵּ֖חַ <sup>6779 </sup> <n>to grow again</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> גֻּלָּֽח׃ <sup>1548 </sup> <n>he was shaven</n> פ
23: וְסַרְנֵ֣י <sup>5633 </sup> <n>Then the lords</n> פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>of the Philistines</n> נֶֽאֱסְפוּ֙ <sup>622 </sup> <n>gathered them together</n> לִזְבֹּ֧חַ <sup>2076 </sup> <n>for to offer</n> זֶֽבַח־ <sup>2077 </sup> <n>sacrifice</n> גָּד֛וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>a great</n> לְדָג֥וֹן <sup>1712 </sup> <n>unto Dagon</n> אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>their god</n> וּלְשִׂמְחָ֑ה <sup>8057 </sup> <n>and to rejoice</n> וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>for they said</n> נָתַ֤ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>hath delivered</n> אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>Our god</n> בְּיָדֵ֔נוּ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>into our hand</n> אֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> שִׁמְשׁ֥וֹן <sup>8123 </sup> <n>Samson</n> אוֹיְבֵֽינוּ׃ <sup>341 </sup> <n>our enemy</n>
24: וַיִּרְא֤וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>saw</n> אֹתוֹ֙ <sup>853 </sup> הָעָ֔ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>And when the people</n> וַֽיְהַלְל֖וּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>him they praised</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>their god</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אָמְר֗וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>for they said</n> נָתַ֨ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>hath delivered</n> אֱלֹהֵ֤ינוּ <sup>430 </sup> <n>Our god</n> בְיָדֵ֙נוּ֙ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>into our hands</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> א֣וֹיְבֵ֔נוּ <sup>341 </sup> <n>our enemy</n> וְאֵת֙ <sup>853 </sup> מַחֲרִ֣יב <sup>2717 </sup> <n>and the destroyer</n> אַרְצֵ֔נוּ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of our country</n> וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>Who</n> הִרְבָּ֖ה <sup>7235 </sup> <n>many</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> חֲלָלֵֽינוּ׃ <sup>2491 </sup> <n>which slew</n>
25: וַֽיְהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>happened</n> [כִּי <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> כ] [טֹוב כ] (כְּטֹ֣וב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>good</n> ק) לִבָּ֔ם <sup>3820 </sup> <n>And it came to pass when their hearts</n> וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>that they said</n> קִרְא֥וּ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>Call</n> לְשִׁמְשׁ֖וֹן <sup>8123 </sup> <n>for Samson</n> וִישַֽׂחֶק־ <sup>7832 </sup> <n>that he may make us sport</n> לָ֑נוּ וַיִּקְרְא֨וּ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>And they called</n> לְשִׁמְשׁ֜וֹן <sup>8123 </sup> <n>for Samson</n> מִבֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> [הָאֲסִירִים כ] (הָאֲסוּרִ֗ים <sup>615 </sup> <n>bound</n> ק) וַיְצַחֵק֙ <sup>6711 </sup> <n>sport</n> לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>6440 </sup> <n>and he made them</n> וַיַּעֲמִ֥ידוּ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>and they set</n> אוֹת֖וֹ <sup>853 </sup> בֵּ֥ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> הָעַמּוּדִֽים׃ <sup>5982 </sup> <n>him between the pillars</n>
26: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> שִׁמְשׁ֜וֹן <sup>8123 </sup> <n>And Samson</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַנַּ֨עַר <sup>5288 </sup> <n>unto the lad</n> הַמַּחֲזִ֣יק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>that held</n> בְּיָדוֹ֮ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>him by the hand</n> הַנִּ֣יחָה <sup>3240 </sup> <n>Suffer</n> אוֹתִי֒ <sup>853 </sup> [וַהֵימִשֵׁנִי כ] (וַהֲמִשֵׁ֙נִי֙ <sup>3237 </sup> <n>feel</n> ק) אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָֽעַמֻּדִ֔ים <sup>5982 </sup> <n>the pillars</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> הַבַּ֖יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>whereupon the house</n> נָכ֣וֹן <sup>3559 </sup> <n>standeth</n> עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> וְאֶשָּׁעֵ֖ן <sup>8172 </sup> <n>that I may lean</n> עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n>
27: וְהַבַּ֗יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>Now the house</n> מָלֵ֤א <sup>4390 </sup> <n>was full</n> הָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <sup>582 </sup> <n>of men</n> וְהַנָּשִׁ֔ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>and women</n> וְשָׁ֕מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in it</n> כֹּ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> סַרְנֵ֣י <sup>5633 </sup> <n>and all the lords</n> פְלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>of the Philistines</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>were on</n> הַגָּ֗ג <sup>1406 </sup> <n>[were] there and [there were] upon the roof</n> כִּשְׁלֹ֤שֶׁת <sup>7969 </sup> <n>about three</n> אֲלָפִים֙ <sup>505 </sup> <n>thousand</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> וְאִשָּׁ֔ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>and women</n> הָרֹאִ֖ים <sup>7200 </sup> <n>that beheld</n> בִּשְׂח֥וֹק <sup>7832 </sup> <n>made sport</n> שִׁמְשֽׁוֹן׃ <sup>8123 </sup> <n>while Samson</n>
28: וַיִּקְרָ֥א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>called</n> שִׁמְשׁ֛וֹן <sup>8123 </sup> <n>And Samson</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>O Lord</n> יֱהֹוִ֡ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> זָכְרֵ֣נִי <sup>2142 </sup> <n>remember</n> נָא֩ <sup>4994 </sup> <n>please</n> וְחַזְּקֵ֨נִי <sup>2388 </sup> <n>me I pray thee and strengthen</n> נָ֜א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>and please</n> אַ֣ךְ <sup>389 </sup> <n>just</n> הַפַּ֤עַם <sup>6471 </sup> <n>me I pray thee only this once</n> הַזֶּה֙ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>O God</n> וְאִנָּקְמָ֧ה <sup>5358 </sup> <n>be avenged</n> נְקַם־ <sup>5359 </sup> <n>avenged</n> אַחַ֛ת <sup>259 </sup> <n>that I may be at once</n> מִשְּׁתֵ֥י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>for my two</n> עֵינַ֖י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>eyes</n> מִפְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <sup>6430 </sup> <n>of the Philistines</n>
29: וַיִּלְפֹּ֨ת <sup>3943 </sup> <n>took hold</n> שִׁמְשׁ֜וֹן <sup>8123 </sup> <n>And Samson</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁנֵ֣י ׀ <sup>8147 </sup> <n>of the two</n> עַמּוּדֵ֣י <sup>5982 </sup> <n>pillars</n> הַתָּ֗וֶךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>middle</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>upon which the house</n> נָכ֣וֹן <sup>3559 </sup> <n>stood</n> עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> וַיִּסָּמֵ֖ךְ <sup>5564 </sup> <n>and on which it was borne up</n> עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> אֶחָ֥ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>of the one</n> בִּימִינ֖וֹ <sup>3225 </sup> <n>with his right hand</n> וְאֶחָ֥ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>and of the other</n> בִּשְׂמֹאלֽוֹ׃ <sup>8040 </sup> <n>with his left</n>
30: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> שִׁמְשׁ֗וֹן <sup>8123 </sup> <n>And Samson</n> תָּמ֣וֹת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>that [were] therein So the dead</n> נַפְשִׁי֮ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>any</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> פְּלִשְׁתִּים֒ <sup>6430 </sup> <n>with the Philistines</n> וַיֵּ֣ט <sup>5186 </sup> <n>And he bowed</n> בְּכֹ֔חַ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>himself with [all his] might</n> וַיִּפֹּ֤ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>fell</n> הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>and the house</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> הַסְּרָנִ֔ים <sup>5633 </sup> <n>upon the lords</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הָעָ֖ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and upon all the people</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> בּ֑וֹ וַיִּהְי֤וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> הַמֵּתִים֙ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>which he slew</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> הֵמִ֣ית <sup>4191 </sup> <n>than [they] which he slew</n> בְּמוֹת֔וֹ <sup>4194 </sup> <n>at his death</n> רַבִּ֕ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>were more</n> מֵאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> הֵמִ֖ית <sup>4191 </sup> <n>killed</n> בְּחַיָּֽיו׃ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>in his life</n>
31: וַיֵּרְד֨וּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>came down</n> אֶחָ֜יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>Then his brethren</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>and all the house</n> אָבִיהוּ֮ <sup>1 </sup> <n>of his father</n> וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>and took</n> אֹתוֹ֒ <sup>853 </sup> וַֽיַּעֲל֣וּ ׀ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>him and brought [him] up</n> וַיִּקְבְּר֣וּ <sup>6912 </sup> <n>and buried</n> אוֹת֗וֹ <sup>853 </sup> בֵּ֤ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> צָרְעָה֙ <sup>6881 </sup> <n>him between Zorah</n> וּבֵ֣ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> אֶשְׁתָּאֹ֔ל <sup>847 </sup> <n>and Eshtaol</n> בְּקֶ֖בֶר <sup>6913 </sup> <n>in the buryingplace</n> מָנ֣וֹחַ <sup>4495 </sup> <n>of Manoah</n> אָבִ֑יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>his father</n> וְה֛וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> שָׁפַ֥ט <sup>8199 </sup> <n>And he judged</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <sup>6242 </sup> <n>twenty</n> שָׁנָֽה׃ <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> פ
